description.body: Rank Shields have been added to Competitive Mode. It’s time to start the grind.
This should be simple enough. I flush them out. You finish them.
Tejo joins the roster. Plus new cosmetics, a new map rotation, updates to Remake Voting, and more.
Tejo’s got a simple message for anyone in his way: give up your position, or give up your life.
Ready the squad while we kickoff Season 2025.

title: Squad Boost +  End of Year Event Pass—Live Now

description.body: A Squad Boost is active, just in time for the end of year Event Pass.
Refuel your arsenal with the new additions to the Araxys skinline. Featuring the Phantom, Outlaw, Guardian, Sheriff and the Bio-Atomizers. Bundle drops in the shop on Dec 12th.
Updates to Neon, Vyse, and gameplay systems like communication pings and weapon skin upgrades.

title: VALORANT x Arcane: The Season 2 Arcane Collector’s Set is here

description.body: Everything you need to know about the Limited Edition bundle.
Updates to Sentinels, Controllers, and Phoenix, the addition of a Regen Shield, changes to gameplay systems, and much much more.
Bug fixes to various Agents, such as Gekko, Fade, and Deadlock, and more.
Updates to Yoru’s Fakeout, Gekko’s abilities, and Sunset. New: TDM map Glitch.

title: JUST ONE MORE // Ep 9: Act III

description.body: New skinlines, the Year End Patches and so much more in the last act of COLLISION.
Astra’s Cosmic Divide and Cypher’s Spycam updates, various bug fixes, and more.
Player Behavior and Gameplay Systems updates, New Player Tips for those new to VALORANT, and more.
The Void gazes back. Singularity returns.
How the anti-cheat team continues to evolve as cheaters do.
Updates to the number of Astra’s stars, Chamber’s Rendezvous radius, Player Behavior, and more.
Vyse joins the team as our newest Sentinel, Split is entering Unrated and Swift Play on Console.
See the master tactician Vyse in action before she launches in Episode 09: Act II.

title: ALL PATHS END HERE // Vyse Agent Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: All paths end with Vyse–lethal tactician, metal manipulator, and the newest Sentinel Agent in VALORANT.
Improvements to ground spreading abilities, Pearl is entering Unrated and Swift Play on Console.
An update about the regional availability of VALORANT on console.

title: INCURSIONS // Official Console Cinematic Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: Break through into a brand new way to play with VALORANT on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X | S.
Basic Training comes to PC, Icebox comes to Console.
Console players: time to put your Lotus strats to the test.
Never go it alone with the Evori Dreamwings–new skins hitting VALORANT in Episode 9 Act I.
Welcome to the first patch and Act of Episode 9.

title: THE FUTURE’S READY // Episode 9: Act I Trailer

description.body: Brave the chasm of the newest map Abyss, explore the Evori Dreamwings bundle, and witness VALORANT’s best compete to become world champion.

title: Everything You Need to Know About Premier

description.body: Got a burning question about Premier? Look no further.
Watch your step… check out our latest map, Abyss.

title: SANCTUM OF SECRETS // Abyss Official Map Trailer

description.body: Gaze into the Abyss: a clandestine base buried deeper than its secrets.

title: VALORANT CONSOLE ANNOUNCE // Welcome Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: Together, we are VALORANT. Join us as we head to PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X | S.
Get your Basic Training on.
Brimmy with a stimmy? How about Brimmy with appropriately sized smokes?

title: YOU DIFF // Episode 8: Act III Kickoff - VALORANT

description.body: Defy expectations and prove that in EPISODE 08 // ACT III the difference is YOU.
Viper and Cypher kinda rhyme, no?

title: Premier: Promotion and Connecting to Pro Play

description.body: Need more info on how you can get one step closer to playing in the VCT? You’ve come to the right place.
Omen said “doors can’t stop me now.”
🦋Clove arrives, a small update to Premier, and a few bug fixes, welcome to Patch 8.05!🦋
Make a bit of mischief with the ultimate comeback kid, Clove: landing in VALORANT during Episode 8: Act II.

title: Clove: Death Is Only The Beginning

description.body: Go behind the scenes with the Clove dev team.
Make some mischief from beyond the grave with Scottish troublemaker Clove.
We’ve got some updates to Premier, just in time for the next Stage. As well as some bug fixes across the board.

title: BE THEIR BANE // Primordium Skin Reveal Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: Born from lava and brimstone, the Primordium Skins were summoned to aid you in the art of unmaking.
Chamber mains: have fun with Tour De Force.

title: YOU’RE IN // XERØFANG Skin Reveal Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: Grab the XERØFANG Vandal, Ghost, and Melee before the party's over.
Get ready—the Esports Hub is back. Plus art updates to Viper’s Poison Cloud and the Snakebite Shorty.
We’re out here reopening halls and updating Agent abilities.

title: A New Addition to the Arsenal: Outlaw Insights

description.body: Learn more about how the team designed the Outlaw, before it launches at the start of Episode 8.

title: TAKE THE LEAD // Episode 8: Act I Kickoff - VALORANT

description.body: Step it up with the new sniper Outlaw, a fresh Battlepass, and the Kuronami skinline.
New: the Outlaw. Old, but also kinda new: Lotus and Icebox.
Bring the fight and make them know your name in Episode 8: DEFIANCE.
It’s the last Patch for 2023 and Episode 7!

title: DRIFT // Team Deathmatch Map Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: Welcome to paradise, Agents. Drift lands in Episode 07: Act III.
A Deadlock update and more ahead.

title: EYES ON ME // Episode 7: Act III Kickoff - VALORANT

description.body: Be a name worth remembering with Iso, a new Event Pass, Valiant Hero, Premier Stage E7A3, and a new Battlepass.
Say hello to Iso and Episode 7 Act III.

title: GREATNESS // Valiant Hero Skin Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: Forge your path to greatness with the Valiant Hero Ghost, Ares, Vandal, Operator, and Ruyi Staff Melee.
Witness a trained professional in action. Iso’s headed right for the VALORANT roster in Episode 7: Act III.
Iso, VALORANT’s newest Duelist Agent from China, joins us in Episode 7: Act III.
Where there's smoke, there's… Brimstone?
Is someone knocking on Haven’s door?
Sage has something to say.
Go Astral in Patch 7.05.

title: YOU. ARE. HERE. // Episode 7: Act II Kickoff - VALORANT

description.body: Explore Sunset, ride the Champions hype into Premier, then experience Imperium and a new Battlepass in Act II.
Come on down to Sunset. We’ve got some food trucks and tons of traffic.

title: BRING IT // Premier Global Launch Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: Across the globe and at every skill level, Premier is here for you.

title: RISE OF THE DRAGON KINGS // Imperium Skin Reveal Trailer - VALORANT

description.body: Experience elegance with edge in the Imperium skinline.
The long road to Los Angeles ends here. See VALORANT’s first foray into this vibrant new map set in Gekko’s stomping grounds.
Welcome to the official launch of Premier. Here’s what you need to know.
Rejoice - favoriting newly required items has been made easier.
Here come some Deadlock bug fixes.
The Champions skin line gets even better. Celebrate Champions 2023 with the all-new, limited edition collection! Available 8/4 in the in-game store.
We’ve got Agent updates, Player Behavior updates, and a (big) Competitive update for you (hint: get your Premier team ready).
